title: ClearOPS Reports GenAI
description: Drafting from scratch suffers from the cold start problem. Trying to find a template online is usually a long, fruitless process. Plus, once you have the template you have to customize it with your organization's detail. With our ReportsGenAI you can use RAG to customize any template or policy. Upload your own template or use our system to prompt a new one from scratch. It's fun, easy and very productive!
